articles.description: The national governing body's cost-cutting measures lead to fears about the long-term health of cricket in Australia, as staff numbers and junior programs fall by the wayside.
articles.content:
There are growing fears cost-cutting measures undertaken by Cricket Australia (CA) are jeopardising the future of the game.
